## Installation pip install valo-apiIf you want to use the async functions, you need to install the `aiohttp` package. pip install valo-api[async]## Documentation### HostedThe documentation is hosted here: https://raimannma.github.io/ValorantAPI/### From SourceAfter installing the package dependencies `pip install -r requirements.txt`, you can use the following commands to get the documentation: cd docs/ && make htmlOpen the index.html file in the docs/_build/html/ directory.
